title: Classic Candy (Cookbook) 2013 [Epub & Mobi]
description:
Classic Candy: Old Style Fudge, Taffy, Caramel Corn, and Dozens
of Other Treats for the Modern Kitchen
Author: Abigail R Gehring
Published: September 1, 2013
Publisher: Skyhorse Publishing
ISBN: 9781626360051
Format: Retail Epub and Mobi
Reader Required:
Epub- Adobe Digital Editions, Calibre, MoonReader for Android
Mobi- Kindle app, Calibre, MoonReader for Android

Tested on the above readers with no problems.
Please allow a couple seconds for the seedboxes to kick in
then it should move pretty quick.
This book has a lot of great recipes and the author shows how to make them
with the tools that you have a home. Plus they look yum, I want taffy!
Enjoy :D
